About Me

My name is Danny Rodrigues, I am a 25 year old student at Stony Brook University
hoping to graduate in May 2016. Throughout my time at Stony Brook and my previous years
at Suffolk County Community College I have learned many helpful strategies and algorithms
in a slew of different languages.

Relevant Classes include:

  • ↳ Advanced Java/Data Structures
  • ↳ System Fundamentals in MIPS Architecture
  • ↳ Advanced System Architecture in C
  • ↳ Internet Programming with Servlets and JSP's
  • ↳ Principles of Programming Languages (Python/Prolog/SML)
  • ↳ Analysis of Algorithms
  • ↳ Android Programming

For more information you can view my resume in the projects below

Favorite Quote :
